org.treetank.service.jaxrx.implementation
Class NodeIdRepresentation

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.service.jaxrx.implementation.NodeIdRepresentation

public class NodeIdRepresentation
extends Object

This class is responsible to work with database specific XML node id's. It allows to access a resource by a node id, modify an existing resource by node id, delete an existing resource by node id and to append a new resource to an existing XML element identified by a node id.

Author:
Patrick Lang, Lukas Lewandowski, University of Konstanz

Method Detail

getResource

public javax.ws.rs.core.StreamingOutput getResource(String resourceName,
                                                    long nodeId,
                                                    Map<org.jaxrx.core.QueryParameter,String> queryParams)
                                             throws org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException
This method is responsible to deliver the whole XML resource addressed by a unique node id.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the database, where the node id belongs.
nodeId - The unique node id of the requested resource.
queryParams - The optional query parameters.
Returns:
The whole XML resource addressed by a unique node id.
Throws:
org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException - The exception occurred.

getResourceByAT

public javax.ws.rs.core.StreamingOutput getResourceByAT(String resourceName,
                                                        long nodeId,
                                                        Map<org.jaxrx.core.QueryParameter,String> queryParams,
                                                        EIdAccessType accessType)
                                                 throws org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException
This method is responsible to deliver the whole XML resource addressed by a unique node id.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the database, where the node id belongs.
nodeId - The unique node id of the requested resource.
queryParams - The optional query parameters.
accessType - The id access type to access a resource by a relative method type defined in EIdAccessType.
Returns:
The whole XML resource addressed by a unique node id.
Throws:
org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException - The exception occurred.

performQueryOnResource

public javax.ws.rs.core.StreamingOutput performQueryOnResource(String resourceName,
                                                               long nodeId,
                                                               String query,
                                                               Map<org.jaxrx.core.QueryParameter,String> queryParams)
This method is responsible to perform a XPath query expression on the XML resource which is addressed through a unique node id.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the database, the node id belongs to.
nodeId - The node id of the requested resource.
query - The XPath expression.
queryParams - The optional query parameters (output, wrap, revision).
Returns:
The result of the XPath query expression.

deleteResource

public void deleteResource(String resourceName,
                           long nodeId)
                    throws org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException
This method is responsible to delete an XML resource addressed through a unique node id (except root node id).

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the database, which the node id belongs to.
nodeId - The unique node id.
Throws:
org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException - The exception occurred.

modifyResource

public void modifyResource(String resourceName,
                           long nodeId,
                           InputStream newValue)
                    throws org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException
This method is responsible to modify the XML resource, which is addressed through a unique node id.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the database, where the node id belongs to.
nodeId - The node id.
newValue - The new value of the node that has to be replaced.
Throws:
org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException - The exception occurred.

addSubResource

public void addSubResource(String resourceName,
                           long nodeId,
                           InputStream input,
                           EIdAccessType type)
                    throws org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException
This method is responsible to perform a POST request to a node id. This method adds a new XML subtree as first child or as right sibling to the node which is addressed through a node id.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the database, the node id belongs to.
nodeId - The node id.
input - The new XML subtree.
type - The type which indicates if the new subtree has to be inserted as right sibling or as first child.
Throws:
org.jaxrx.core.JaxRxException - The exception occurred.
